job_history.work_description: Teach fitness classes ensuring safe, effective and fun workouts for all levels. Provide challenging options and modifications as needed. Observe and model good body mechanics. Communicate regularly with members to enhance knowledge of exercises, body alignment and exercise safety. Motivate members to be consistent, work toward achieving their goals, be fit and be happy.

Led fitness classes for mom's and babies in strollers. Used body weight, resistance equipment (ie,resistance. tubing) and general surroundings to provide effective, safe and fun workouts for class participants. Observed and modeled good body mechanics. Acted as role model and motivated participants to be fit and active moms.

Led fitness classes for mom's and babies in strollers. Used body weight, resistance equipment (ie,resistance. tubing) and general surroundings to provide effective, safe and fun workouts for class participants. Observed and modeled good body mechanics. Acted as role model and motivated participants to be fit and active moms.

Led fitness classes for mom's and babies in strollers. Used body weight, resistance equipment (ie,resistance. tubing) and general surroundings to provide effective, safe and fun workouts for class participants. Observed and modeled good body mechanics. Acted as role model and motivated participants to be fit and active moms.

Managed NY territory, marketing and selling a portfolio of arthritis, asthma and osteoporosis products to doctors, surgeons and pharmacists. Coordinated and conducted routine business/territory analysis to identify business opportunities and competitive threats. Served as District Champion for Singulair, providing strong leadership to the district by communicating frequently on new bulletins, and different initiatives.

Product management of Canon's Office Products Line. Responsibilities included launching new products for major accounts such as Office Depot, Staples and Office Max. Acted as Staples' Key Account Representative coordinating all trainings and public events for Staples Stores nationwide.

Promoted 'computer learning' school to educators in a territory comprised of 73 high schools. This marketing resulted in increased awareness of The Cittone Institute's programs and opportunities. Led motivational presentations for high school classes ranging in size from 10 to 100 students.

Coach small group training classes utilizing an assortment of exercise equipment; ie; dumbells, TRX suspension straps, Bosu Balls, ab dollies, water rowers and treadmills. Responsible for providing safe and effective exercise modifications on an as needed basis. Motivate members to work beyond their expectations in a fun, yet professional manner.

skills.name: Group Fitness Instruction
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience leading fitness classes for various groups, including mom's and babies in strollers, and has demonstrated expertise in providing safe, effective, and fun workouts.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has shown strong leadership skills in various roles, including serving as a District Champion for Singulair and leading motivational presentations for high school classes.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Has experience in marketing and selling products, including managing a NY territory for pharmaceutical products and launching new products for major accounts.

skills.name: Public Relations
skills.explanation: Has experience in promoting products and services to educators and the public, including leading presentations for high school classes.

skills.name: Product Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in product management, including launching new products for major accounts and coordinating trainings and public events.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has demonstrated strong communication skills in various roles, including leading fitness classes, marketing products, and leading presentations.

skills.name: Motivation
skills.explanation: Has shown ability to motivate others, including fitness class participants and sales teams.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing time effectively, including coordinating multiple tasks and responsibilities in various roles.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Has experience working in teams, including leading fitness classes and working with sales teams.
